mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, (@row_number:=@row_number + 1) AS rnum FROM ( SELECT RCRIT_BBS.BBS_SN, BAND_TEAM_NM, RCRIT_GENRE_ID, RCRIT_BBS.MBR_ID, RCRIT_AREA_ID, RCRIT_REALM_ID, MBR_NCNM, BBS_CN, MBR_PROFL_PHOTO, RCRIT_STTUS_CD, RCRIT_NOPE, RCRIT_BBS.REG_DT, BBS_READ_CNT FROM RCRIT_BBS LEFT OUTER JOIN MBR_INFO ON RCRIT_BBS.MBR_ID = MBR_INFO.MBR_ID ORDER BY BBS_SN DESC ) AS j, (SELECT @row_number:=0) AS temp ) AS result WHERE rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}
